subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The Croat rode his big serve to a 3-6, 6-4, 7-6 (7-1) victory over the defending champion, Rafael Nadal, at the BNP Paribas Open, while the American outlasted Robin Soderling, 6-4, 3-6, 6-3.
snippet: The Croat rode his big serve to a 3-6, 6-4, 7-6 (7-1) victory over the defending champion, Rafael Nadal, at the BNP Paribas Open, while the American outlasted Robin Soderling, 6-4, 3-6, 6-3.
